summary.para: The SecPkgContext_EapKeyBlock structure contains key data used by the EAP TLS Authentication Protocol. For information about the EAP TLS Authentication Protocol, see http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2716.txt.
An array of 128 bytes that contain key data used by the EAP TLS Authentication Protocol.
An array of 64 bytes that contain initialization vector data used by the EAP TLS Authentication Protocol.
